AIRCZ Type: AIRPORTDescription: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: T.1 Norway Maple - 2m Lateral reduction of overhanging branches.T.2 Silver Birch - Fell.T.3 Leyland Cypress - Reduce height to 4m.T.4 Copper Beech - 3m Holistic crown reduction.T.5 Beech - Remove low limb to west at 5m, pruning to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.6 Oak - Reduce low limb to west at 5m, pruning to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.7 Beech - Remove low limb at 6m.T. 8 Deodar Cedar - Reduce low limbs to south around 6m, cutting to suitable pruning points;remove broken limb to east at 8m and crown clean by removal of major dead, stubs and hangers
